objective: Design a prompt for Codex to refactor logging into structured JSON output.
context: Services use Python 3.13 and must maintain backward compatibility.

prompt_components.content: You are an AI coding assistant working in the Multi Agent Governance repository. Follow AGENTS.md policies. Constraints: Touch only src/logging/*.py; Do not change logging levels; Avoid introducing new dependencies.

Refactor the logging module to emit structured JSON. Context: Services use Python 3.13 and must maintain backward compatibility. Verification expectations: - Run pytest src/logging/tests - Document changes in CHANGELOG.md

guardrails: Run tests or linters specified in the prompt before completion.
Do not modify files outside the listed targets.
Explain reasoning briefly when deviating from suggested steps.
